question: Which port is to host maximum number of cruise ships in 2019-20?
explanation: Mumbai port has emerged as a cruise destination and is projected to receive 259 cruise ships in 2019-20 with an estimated 1.81 lakh passengers as compared to only 40 cruise vessels received in 2015-16 with 37,820 passengers. Among the five ports (Mumbai, Goa, Mangalore, Kochi and Chennai) that receive cruise ships in India, Mumbai has received the maximum number of vessels.
